issue.title: Basket : not using plural string
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Basket does not use Joomla plural system, we end up having strings like:
"1 donnée(s) ..."
"Donnée(s) fournie(s) par : ..."


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In my sandbox
